name: hapilizer
description: **[Satellizer](https://github.com/sahat/satellizer)** is a simple to use, end-to-end, token-based authentication module for [AngularJS](http://angularjs.org) with built-in support for Google, Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter, Instagram, GitHub, Bitbucket, Yahoo, Twitch, Microsoft (Windows Live) OAuth providers, as well as Email and Password sign-in. However, you are not limited to the sign-in options above, in fact you can add any *OAuth 1.0* or *OAuth 2.0* provider by passing provider-specific information in the app *config* block.
